title: building on plot area upto 150 sq
clause_text: building on plot area upto 150 sq.mt. (low risk category) and on plot area more than 150 sq.mt. upto 300 sq.mt. (moderate risk category) subject to compliance as per APPENDIX - K.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
